data.expected_result: It should show when its going to expire (in 1 Hour)
data.short_description: Changing an Invite from Win7 (1 Day to 1 Hour) makes lets 4 Stars (*) appear in the Audit Logs
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the Server Name - Click on Invite People - Click on Edit invite link. - Change expire after to 1 Hour - Open audit logs on your Android Phone - Click on last Invite created by you
